actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to further amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 (as amended) so as to permit charitable contributions, bequests, transfers, and gifts to the United Nations and the United Nations Children's Fund, to be deductible for income tax, estate tax, and gift tax purposes.

summary.text: Permits charitable contributions, bequests, transfers, and gifts to the United Nations and the United Nations Children's Fund, to be deductible for income tax, estate tax, and gift tax purposes under the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: A bill to further amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 (as amended) so as to permit charitable contributions, bequests, transfers, and gifts to the United Nations and the United Nations Children's Fund, to be deductible for income tax, estate tax, and gift tax purposes.
